casebody.data:
Dunbar, Assignee, v. Hobbs. L. C. Duncan for the appellant. Hoffman, Benjamin and Micou for the defendant.

THIS THIS was an appeal from a judgment of the Commercial Court of New Orleans, Watts, J. The case was remanded for a new trial, with leave to the plaintiff to amend his petition. There was no decision on any of the questions involved in the controversy.
